author: Staff Reporter
text:
The district administrations efforts to resolve the issue of establishing taluk office for the newly formed Komarapalayam Taluk failed as representatives from Pallipalayam stick to their demands here on Tuesday.

After the formation of new taluk was established, the administration recommended the government for establishing the office at Pallipalayam to which traders in Komarapalayam opposed.

Minister for Industries and Transport P. Thangamani later promised to construct the office in Komarapalayam. With deadlock continuing, a peace talk was conducted by the administration at the collectorate here on Tuesday.

The DRO assured to take up their demands.
title: Taluk office row: talks fail to break deadlock
